abstract: A slide show of photographs from the past week in New York City and the region. Subjects include the opening of the first casino in New York City, a record-breaking gift for the High Line and haunted tours through the State Capitol.
snippet: A slide show of photographs from the past week in New York City and the region. Subjects include the opening of the first casino in New York City, a record-breaking gift for the High Line and haunted tours through the State Capitol.

headline.main: The Week in Pictures for Oct. 28
